definition[0]: to shine brightly with flashing points of light
example[0]: The river glittered in the sunlight.
definition[1]: if someone’s eyes glitter, they shine very brightly and show a particular strong emotion
example[1]: His blue eyes glittered with anger.
definition[2]: brightness consisting of many flashing points of light
example[2]: the glitter of his gold cigarette case
definition[3]: a bright shining expression in someone’s eyes that shows a particular emotion
example[3]: There was no mistaking the mocking glitter in his eyes.
definition[4]: the exciting attractive quality of a place or a way of life which is connected with rich or famous people
example[4]: The glamour and glitter of London was not for him.
definition[5]: very small pieces of shiny paper that are used for decoration
